name: Sand Trap
description:
Harold and friends have arrived at a town in the middle of the desert. But where is everybody? Help them solve the mystery in this short game jam RPG!

Tip: Press alt-enter for full screen mode.

Enter The Haroldverse theme used:

  • Harold Immortal (Harold misinterprets the word "immoral")

Sub-themes used:

  • HTML (The letters of the keys to the castle)
  • Spark & Heal (2 of Harold's default skills)

Made with RPG Maker VX Ace

If the game says that you need to download the RTP, get it here: https://www.rpgmakerweb.com//run-time-package
